titleStmt.title: SII 7.109: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 109. (A.R. No. 99 of 1900). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . sakalalokacca
kravat=ti śrīIrācaṉārāyaṇaṉ Attip
paṟṟu nāvaṟpākkamāṉa tiruñāṉacampanta
rnallūr Ūravaṟkum Ivvūril piṟivāṉa
kutiraiccevakaṉ tāṅkal Ūravaṟkum taṅ
kaḷ Ūr palataḷi pūcaippātiyum nikki nālā
vatu cittiraimātamutal kaṭamai Āyam kao
yil muṟṟuvappeṟu Uḷḷiṭṭa pala nellāyaṅkaḷu
m poṉvari kāttikaikkāṇikkai vācalviniyo
kam nāṭṭuvari vaḻinaṭaikku Iṭum paṇam muṉṉiṭum paṇa
m Eṭuttaḷavu viruttuppaṭi Aricikāṇam kaivilaikā
ṇam nallerutu naṟkiṭā tevaikkiṭumpaṇam Atikā
rikku kuṭukkum mutal mantaippaṇam vācaṟpaṇam vā
cal kuḻi Ūrkkaṇakkar Ācupotumakkaḷperkkaṭa
mai Ūrkkaṇakkar taṭṭārperāl Ūcivāci Inavari
meṟcuṭṭivari kāttikaippaccai putunellu cūlava
ri māvaṭai maravaṭai taṟikkaṭamai Āyam nūlāyam ceṭ
ṭikaḷ vāṇikar ceṉaiyaṅkāṭikaḷ Ivarkaḷ peṟkaṭamai
kaṇmaṭṭavari karuvūlavari puḻukukaṭamai cekkukkaṭamai Eri
mīṉkācu Iṭaiyarpeṟkaṭamai paḻavari putuvari maṟṟum
Ippaṟṟil koḷḷum palavarikaḷum palaUpātikaḷum Uṭ
paṭa tiruppāṭṭu Otum māheśvararkku Ivvūr nañcai
puñcai toṭṭappaṟṟu nāṟpāṟkellai Ūraṭa
ṅkalum Utakapūrvvadharmmadānam kāṇi maṭappuṟam sa
rvvamānṉiya IṟaiyiliĀka kaiyolai kuṭutta pā
kam 4 10 8 Itil devapākam 2 viṣṇupākam 1 nīkki
pākam 4 10 5 Ākap pākam nāṟpatteṭṭum Ivarkaḷu
kku kāṇi maṭappuṟa Iṟaiyili sarvvamānṉiyamāka
kuṭuttom Ivarkaḷukku viṟṟoṟṟiparikkiṟaiyaṅkaḷu
kkum tānaādhamanavikkiṟaiyaṅkaḷukkum sakalaprāttikkum Urittāvatā
kavum Ippaṭikku kallilum cempilum veṭṭikkoṇ
ṭu cantirātittavaraiyum cellak kuṭuttom Iṉṉā
ḷmutal Ippaṭi ceyka Ittanmattukku Ahitam paṇṇi
nā ruṇṭākil pañcapātakam paṇṇina pāvam koḷ
ḷakkaṭavarkaḷ Ākavum Itu panmāheśvara rakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 7.109 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
